mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (post_no, regdate, id, content, likes, del_flag) VALUES (post_post_no_seq.nextval, sysdate, #{id}, #{content}, 0, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM post p, img i WHERE p.post_no = i.post_no AND i.img_no IN (SELECT MIN(img_no) FROM img GROUP BY post_no) ORDER BY p.post_no DESC
